showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:60}); // “Hey!!
It's you!!”{PAUSE}“Sorry, but I already heard about you.”{PAUSE}“In addition to dressing like a woman,
it seems you like
to smash and grind things.”{PAUSE}“We only let cultured customers in!
Got it? Then you'd better leave!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:59}); // “That's funny.
A hard, spiky hairstyle!
Looks kinda familiar…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:53}); // “I asked {Aeris} for a date…”{PAUSE}“And she said not even if I paid her
1,000,000 gil.”{PAUSE}“Her flowers cost 300 gil, too…
She's a good business woman.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // “What the hell!? You *%^&!!

I'm busy right now!!”{PAUSE}“I'm feelin' like there's
gonna be a fight!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:61}); // “Heee…
The Shinra have occupied this shop!”

dialogStrings: Honey Bee Inn

{Aeris}
“Hey!!
{Cloud}!!”

Johnny
“Man…
Should I go…or not?”{PAUSE}“…I get so mental at times like this.
I'm hopeless!!”

Johnny
“Hey!! Aren't you?”{PAUSE}“What?? You mean you're…too?”
{CHOICE}Yeah, me too.
{CHOICE}Don't bring me down to your level.”

“You're {Tifa}'s childhood friend,
and you brought a new girlfriend
to a place like this!?”{PAUSE}“What kind of guy are you!!”

“What…me too.
I decided this after a lot of deep thought.
My last memories of Midgar…you know.”{PAUSE}“But…
That guy over there kinda scares me.”

“What the hell!? You *%^&!!
This ain't no #$*&^% show!!
I'm busy right now!!”{PAUSE}“I'm feelin' like there's
gonna be a fight!!”

“Mmm?
That's too bad.”{PAUSE}“This used to be
where the Honey Bee Inn was!!”{PAUSE}“Now, it's a barrack
for the Shinra soldiers.”

“Welcome!!
Even unpopular dweebs like you
may meet their destiny here!!”{PAUSE}“Pretty good, huh? Ha ha ha!”

“Ha ha ha !!”{PAUSE}“All the young bucks gather and
deceive this innocent young girl…”{PAUSE}“Ohhh boy!! It's healthy,
it's wholesome!!”{PAUSE}“You gotta be like this
when you're young!”

“Yeow!!
Hey, Princess!!”

Johnny
“Uh…ummm
I, I…”{PAUSE}“Uh…ummm…”{PAUSE}“I'm…Jo…Johnny…
Nice to meet you.”

“Yeah,
I only talk to the pretty ones.”{PAUSE}“Mmmm, you're the one.
You're just great.”

Johnny
“What kind of person are you!?”{PAUSE}“You stay out all night at {Aeris}'s
and don't come home till morning!”{PAUSE}“Uhh…little {Aeris}…
I, I'm…heartbroken again.”

“I heard. You two were gettin' chummy
in the park together.”

“Oh man!!
Enter the boyfriend.”

“Urrrrgh…no way…
I can't go on.”{PAUSE}“Things aren't working out.”{PAUSE}“Between our differences and my pay,
it just isn't cutting it.”

“Welcome!!
Even unpopular dweebs like you
may meet their destiny here!!”{PAUSE}“You looking for a girlfriend too?”
{CHOICE}You know a girl named {Tifa}?
{CHOICE}This place doesn't interest me.

“Hey, you're pretty fast.
{Tifa}'s our newest girl.”{PAUSE}“But, unfortunately,
she's having an interview right now.”{PAUSE}“Here at the Honey Bee Inn,
it's customary for all the new girls to
be taken to Don Corneo's mansion.”{PAUSE}“Don Corneo's a famous dilettante.
Now he wants to settle down and
is in the market for a bride.”

“Hmm…Seems to like it just fine.
Good for you.”

“Mmm!
Please, please!”

“The Honey Bee Inn is a private club.
Only members can go in. Shoo, shoo.”

“Hey! Is that a "Member's Card" I see
shining in your hot little hand?”{PAUSE}“Please, come in.”

{Aeris}
“…Hmmmm.
Sure, good excuse…”

{Cloud}
“Looks like I need to go inside
to complete my disguise.”

{Cloud}
“See ya!”

“Uh, sir!!
It's almost closing time…”{PAUSE}“So, please remember
any personal belongings.”

“Uuuh! I want flowers too!
But, I get so nervous in front
of cute girls…”{PAUSE}“It just seems natural to get cautious…”

“I bought some pretty flowers
from {Aeris}.”{PAUSE}“500 gil, a little expensive.
Well, at least I got her name.”

Johnny
“{Aeris}…
Thanks for the flower and 1 gil.”{PAUSE}“I'll treasure this!
I'm going to dry it and
keep it for good luck.”

“I asked {Aeris} for a date…”{PAUSE}“And she said not even if I paid her
1,000,000 gil.”{PAUSE}“Her flowers cost 300 gil, too…
She's a good business woman.”

{Aeris}
“They bought lots of flowers from me.”

“It's closing time.
…yawn…I'm so sleepy…”

“Sir, is everything all right?
Look, {Aeris} looks so lonely.”

“Uurrgh!
So, this is it for today, huh?”

“Ummm, young girls…soft skin.
Ummm, OK, I'm refreshed now!”{PAUSE}“Mmmm? Pretty hard.
You work out?”

“That's funny.
A hard, spiky hairstyle!
Looks kinda familiar…”

“Hey!!
It's you!!”{PAUSE}“Sorry, but I already heard about you.”{PAUSE}“In addition to dressing like a woman,
it seems you like
to smash and grind things.”{PAUSE}“We only let cultured customers in!
Got it? Then you'd better leave!”

“Heee…
The Shinra have occupied this shop!”
“This shop is now under Shinra rule.”
